Love the material but awkward size. Oversized wide and short. Returned
I love this for Fall… stylish, comfortable, love the color🤗👍

I ordered two tops AT THE SAME TIME, and the blue one is fleece-lined, beautiful color, and a lovely winter weight. The mauve one has no fleece, and the material is completely different and it’s a spring or summer weight. It is not soft, it is  not anything like the blue one, BUT THE PRICE IS THE SAME!!! I dont know how these companies, who utilize Amazon, get away with these kind of bate and switch business practices. Not only does it feel like I’m being robbed, it is unethical to send a completely different type and kind of top WITHOUT INFORMING THE BUYER!!!
This sweatshirt is comfortable,warm,beautiful  colorant good quality. I have bought 2 and I want to get more  colors!!
Has purple dots on it. Will be returning it.

评论概述: The picture does not depict the actual color.
评论详情: I have the sweatshirt in other colors and I like the quality of the shirt, but the picture does not depict the actual color of the yellow. It is a school bus yellow instead of the soft yellow in the picture. Very disappointed.

评论概述: Shirt is not as long as advertised in picture
评论详情: I ordered this based off description and picture thinking it would be perfect to wear with leggings.  It does not fit like shown.  It comes nowhere near covering the butt and is not loose fitting.

Nice weight of the "sweat" flocking inside...not too heavy.  The color I ordered (Spinach) wasn't flattering on me.  I thought it looked like a grayish green, but no, it really is the color of Spinach.  In order to have it drape over my bum, I ordered a large.  It did the trick there, but then the arms were too long and overly boxy in torso.  It will be lovely on a slimmer, taller body type.
Super soft,  pretty,  great quality,  perfect for anytime.  Definitely buying more from this company!
Very comfortable washes up nicely

评论用户: The pink is a baby pink not a coral color.
评论详情: The color is not coral as it appears in the picture.

The fit is true to size,the arm length is generous especially for someone who is tall (I'm 5'9) and the sleeves hit at my wrist. The issue I have is the with the sweatshirts ribbed hem it's tapered and fits tighter through the hips and there's not any stretch. I purchased other colors of the same sweatshirt and this is not an issue with those. Also about the color it was disappointing.  A pretty pastel yellow is pictured but is actually a yellow mustard color.

评论概述: Love the color and the fit
评论详情: This sweatshirt is exactly what I was looking for. I had tried a few others and returned them because I didn't like the fit or the color was not what I expected. I go it in taupe and the color is beautiful.  I am a bit big in the chest and I hate to buy large because then it is too big all over.  I bought a medium and it fits perfect.
Love the fit and feel
Really cozy and soft material.  Bought as a gift.  She really loves it

评论概述: Pretty color but red marks on front
评论详情: I love this color blue but what are these red dots? The fabric is very soft and comfortable.  This item ran very large. Have to return this one.
I like the color, shape and weight but the sleeves are a tad too long.

I like the weight of this shirt for workouts. The first wash was fine although I dried it in the dryer separately so it didn't get wrinkled. No, I'm not going to iron sweatshirts! I ordered three colors. The hot pink hasn't been washed yet. We will see.
I got the light blue. It’s great quality and very comfortable. I want to order more colors.
This sweatshirt is very soft and I love the color.  It is shorter than I thought it would be from the picture, as I wanted to wear it with leggings.

The very first one I bought I loved. I bought  a second...terrible quality... shame on me for buying the third. Also as terrible as the second! Never again.  Feel duped. Sad that they are allowed to sell this 😔

I ordered what it said what size I should. I'm a small person it told me to order a medium, I should of ordered a small. It runs big. The material is soft and I really like the color and wasn't too bothered by the size.  I was comfy wearing it. I ordered a bright blue one too. I would recommend ordering the sweatshirt . The value of the shirt was worth it.

评论用户: I love it!!! Made well, nice material and very beautiful! Color vibrant and well represented in pics.
评论详情: I love it!! It’s beautiful and soft and well made. Not too thick but not thin at all. I can’t wait to wear it!!! It fits great!

评论概述: Wrong color. Apparently if you order yellow,it's not going toi be the right one
评论详情: The shirt is soft and comfy, oversized except at hips (which makes no sense) but I ordered a very pale yellow, which is my favoroite color, ahnd I got a Golden color, which I still like, but it's definitely not the color I ordered.
I really like the sage green color, but that's about it. The sleeves are so long!  It doesn't have a good shape to it, and isn't soft at all.  Not really a sweatshirt. It's just okay.
Love it fits well warm and great color
True to size! Love it.
Nice color.  Soft
Great color , great fabric . Returning because fit is nothing like shown - not long and lean , short and boxy .  Not the look with leggings .. disappointing.

Loved the density and warmth.  But whoever did the measurements must have misunderstood sizing.  I normally wear a 1x (size 20) I ordered a 2x (22-24) because I wanted it big.  Well I would say by American sizing its a 16 with an arm length for a gorilla.  So if you want thick and warm, this is it. If you want really, really long chimp sleeves...yep this is it. If you want it loose and baggy go up at least 2 to 3 sizes.  After I wash it, its going into the donation bag.
The shirt looks just like a regular sweatshirt. Isn’t longer like picture and the design is different. Very disappointed.
The green color was not as expected- a little to bright and Christmasy. Good and warm though.
I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and style of the shirt. I'm glad that I ordered the XL. I am definitely going to order several more.
I ordered the dark brown sweatshirt. The fit is good so I’m keeping it but I’d is maroon. Not even close to brown which is disappointing because I bought it for a specific outfit.
Material is rough and everything sticks to it.
This is a very nice sweater/sweatshirt. It runs a little big but perfect to wear we with thermals under it.. beautiful color and washes great
Love to wear it as it's comfortable on and get compliments.
Size runs small
This is way too big.  Any of the numbers on the gift receipt send me to something completely different.  It has been a nightmare trying to return
I love this sweatshirt. It is soft and fits perfectly. I bought the yellow one and do enjoy it.
The color, fit and material were all really great!!
Shirt came half inside our, tag rolled, it’s been worn

Very good quality for the price. Very soft. Durable. I bought a large and it I could have went with a medium. But works well with leggings to cover your butt with a large.  Overall I love the comfort and size and durability. I will repurchase in other colors.

评论概述: Loved it so much I bought 2
评论详情: Perfect oversize sweatshirt that is comfy and cute! Arm length is perfect and it is a boxier fit which I love since I have broad shoulders.
My new favorite sweatshirt! I just ordered two more! So soft and fits a little baggy but still cute! I need more colors!
My granddaughter uses only this brand because it is very soft and comfortable. She highly recommends it
Soft material, great color, but  I like a set in sleeve for a nicer fit.

评论概述: Item replaced by Amazon had the same defect
评论详情: Love the look and feel of the sweater. The first one arrived and there were ink marks on the front top where some top stitching was. I returned on 12/30 and received the second one 12/31. Opened it and, to my surprise, blue ink dots in the same place. I am in the process of returning it now. Gee, I’m so disappointed.

I am 5’8”, slim to medium build. I got a large in purple. The color is a lovely true lavender color. I love the sleeve length which comes to about my knuckles. The length is perfect so that you don’t lift your arms and show your stomach. It is soft and is a lighter weight, perfect for year round weather.

Got this product really quick which was great. It’s also very soft and color was pretty. That being said, it was obviously worn by someone, as it reeked of someone’s cologne which was kind of gross and it was also sized really big.
Sweatshirt arrived well packaged. It is comfortable & live the color on me. Happy with my order. 👍💗
Felt cheap and the fabric was the worst.  Really thin, too.
Sleeves were too long
too big need tize small cancel

I absolutely love these sweatshirts. I have no idea why this is a “frequently returned item”…..I have bought 5! They do come vacuum sealed when they are shipped so they are very wrinkled at first. This has not been as issue tho as they come out basically wrinkle free after washed/dryed. I also have a steamer that works on the wrinkles too. I am 5’4” 125 lbs and the small fits a little big……but that’s the way I like it. Love the length too.
Color is nothing like the picture, bright yellow not pale yellow.

I love the sweatshirt-soft, comfy, wide band bottom. I ordered pale yellow (as another reviewer stated) and got the bright golden yellow instead. Since I love the sweatshirt I'm keeping it, but seriously...ship what the customer ordered or change your photos accordingly.
This has a vibrant color but the shape is very boxy and it does not provide much warmth
Loved the lightweight feature! Will be buying more. Great price.

The cuffs are not the same as picture. The stick detailing is not the same. The design is not the same. The color is close, but not the same. That said…It’s still comfy and I’m probably gonna keep it. It’s warm, but not super duper fuzzy hot. Which I cannot do, so I am glad about that.

Gorgeous’s color, true to size, I bought several more just like it! The fit is loose and comfy!
They ran small so I went up one size.  Perfect
Love the color, fit and so comfy. Loved it so much I ordered 3 others in different colors and all are great. Highly recommended.
The pictures color is a soft baby yellow, item is almost orange.

Nice color, and feels great. Washes and dries great with no wrinkles. For me size runs small so I would suggest sizing up.

You won't be disappointed.  By far my favorite sweatshirt I have purchased this year.  Not to thick, but enough to keep you warm. Pretty true to size. As described by seller. Color is gorgeous though there are a variety .
This is a great sweatshirt

I love the material!!  It is so comfortable and the fit is great!  Going to order a couple in other colors!!

This is a thin polyester type shirt. NOT a cotton sweatshirt as advertised in the picture.  Will never order from this company again.  Buyer beware.

These sweatshirts are just the right weight for California winters. Super cozy with leggings and medium is just right (I’m 5’7”, 150 lbs) but I worry about shrinking in the wash. I have three colors.  BUT be aware that this material shows EVERY little thing! A tiny speck from lunch, or you leaned against a counter? Now you have a super obvious splotch that doesn’t fade.  Seems to come out in the wash, but I’ve been changing in the middle of the day, which I usually never do. Other than that, these shorts are awesome.
Good fit and nice quality.
The shirt looks nothing like the shirt in the picture

Exactly what I was looking for and couldn't be happier. Purchased in 4 colors. Machine washed (cold) and placed in dryer (medium heat). Very little shrinkage. I'm 5'4" and normally wear a size medium to large. I ordered this in medium and love the oversized fit! Nice and comfortable!
Excellent quality - fit true to size.  Would order again!
I have purchased 3 of these already! Very well made and incredibly soft!
